itemDescription: British writer, film director, screenwriter and playwright

wikipedia_page.main: William Fairchild (sometimes credited as W. E. C. Fairchild) (1918–2000) was an English author, playwright, director and screenwriter. He was married to actress Isabel Dean from 1953 to the early 1970s, and to producer, agent, and writer Robin Dalton from 1992 until his death.
